The Shawshank Redemption.quote: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Andy Dufresne

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: Get busy living, or get busy dying.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Andy Dufresne

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: I guess it comes down to a simple choice, really. Get busy living or get busy dying.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Andy Dufresne

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: Remember, Red, hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Andy Dufresne

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope can drive a man insane.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Red

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: I have to remind myself that some birds aren't meant to be caged.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Red

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: I find I'm so excited I can barely sit still or hold a thought in my head.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Red

The Shawshank Redemption.quote: Andy Dufresne - who crawled through a river of shit and came out clean on the other side.
The Shawshank Redemption.author: Red

The Godfather.quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.
The Godfather.author: Vito Corleone

The Godfather.quote: Great men are not born great, they grow great.
The Godfather.author: Vito Corleone

The Godfather.quote: Revenge is a dish best served cold.
The Godfather.author: Vito Corleone

The Godfather.quote: A friend should always underestimate your virtues and an enemy overestimate your faults.
The Godfather.author: Don Vito Corleone

The Godfather.quote: Never hate your enemies. It affects your judgment.
The Godfather.author: Michael Corleone

The Godfather.quote: Leave the gun. Take the cannoli.
The Godfather.author: Peter Clemenza

The Godfather.quote: A man who doesn't spend time with his family can never be a real man.
The Godfather.author: Vito Corleone

The Godfather.quote: I have learned more in the streets than in any classroom.
The Godfather.author: Don Vito Corleone

The Godfather.quote: Women and children can afford to be careless, but not men.
The Godfather.author: Vito Corleone

Forrest Gump.quote: Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: My mama always said, 'Life was like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.'
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: I may not be a smart man, but I know what love is.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: Mama always said, dying was a part of life.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: I don't know if we each have a destiny, or if we're all just floating around accidental-like on a breeze, but I, I think maybe it's both.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: Bubba was my best good friend. And even I know that ain't something you can find just around the corner.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: Mama always said you got to put the past behind you before you can move on.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

Forrest Gump.quote: There's an awful lot you can tell about a person by their shoes.
Forrest Gump.author: Forrest Gump

The Dark Knight.quote: You either die a hero, or you live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
The Dark Knight.author: Harvey Dent

The Dark Knight.quote: It's not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
The Dark Knight.author: Batman

The Dark Knight.quote: The night is darkest just before the dawn. And I promise you, the dawn is coming.
The Dark Knight.author: Harvey Dent

The Dark Knight.quote: Introduce a little anarchy. Upset the established order, and everything becomes chaos.
The Dark Knight.author: The Joker

The Dark Knight.quote: Some men just want to watch the world burn.
The Dark Knight.author: Alfred

The Dark Knight.quote: You have nothing, nothing to threaten me with. Nothing to do with all your strength.
The Dark Knight.author: The Joker

The Dark Knight.quote: Madness, as you know, is like gravity. All it takes is a little push.
The Dark Knight.author: The Joker

The Dark Knight.quote: I believe whatever doesn't kill you, simply makes you... stranger.
The Dark Knight.author: The Joker

The Dark Knight.quote: Sometimes the truth isn't good enough, sometimes people deserve more. Sometimes people deserve to have their faith rewarded.
The Dark Knight.author: Batman

Titanic.quote: I'm the king of the world!
Titanic.author: Jack Dawson

Titanic.quote: A woman's heart is a deep ocean of secrets.
Titanic.author: Rose DeWitt Bukater

Titanic.quote: I'll never let go, Jack. I'll never let go.
Titanic.author: Rose DeWitt Bukater

Titanic.quote: Winning that ticket, Rose, was the best thing that ever happened to me. It brought me to you.
Titanic.author: Jack Dawson

Titanic.quote: When you got nothing, you got nothing to lose.
Titanic.author: Jack Dawson

Titanic.quote: I figure life's a gift and I don't intend on wasting it.
Titanic.author: Jack Dawson

Titanic.quote: I can see the Statue of Liberty already! Very small, of course.
Titanic.author: Fabrizio

Titanic.quote: I saw my whole life as if I'd already lived it. An endless parade of parties and cotillions, yachts and polo matches.
Titanic.author: Rose DeWitt Bukater

Star Wars.quote: May the Force be with you.
Star Wars.author: Various Characters

Star Wars.quote: I've got a bad feeling about this.
Star Wars.author: Various Characters

Star Wars.quote: Do or do not. There is no try.
Star Wars.author: Yoda

Star Wars.quote: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
Star Wars.author: Darth Vader

Star Wars.quote: The Force will be with you. Always.
Star Wars.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

Star Wars.quote: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You're my only hope.
Star Wars.author: Leia Organa

Star Wars.quote: In my experience, there is no such thing as luck.
Star Wars.author: Obi-Wan Kenobi

The Lord of the Rings.quote: One does not simply walk into Mordor.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Boromir

The Lord of the Rings.quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Galadriel

The Lord of the Rings.quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Gandalf

The Lord of the Rings.quote: Not all those who wander are lost.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Aragorn

The Lord of the Rings.quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Samwise Gamgee

The Lord of the Rings.quote: It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Bilbo Baggins

The Lord of the Rings.quote: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Haldir

The Lord of the Rings.quote: There’s some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it’s worth fighting for.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Samwise Gamgee

The Lord of the Rings.quote: The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places; but still there is much that is fair, and though in all lands love is now mingled with grief, it grows perhaps the greater.
The Lord of the Rings.author: Haldir

Harry Potter.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
Harry Potter.author: Albus Dumbledore

Harry Potter.quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
Harry Potter.author: Albus Dumbledore

Harry Potter.quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
Harry Potter.author: Albus Dumbledore

Harry Potter.quote: It matters not what someone is born, but what they grow to be.
Harry Potter.author: Albus Dumbledore

Harry Potter.quote: Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic.
Harry Potter.author: Albus Dumbledore

Harry Potter.quote: The ones that love us never really leave us.
Harry Potter.author: Sirius Black

Harry Potter.quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
Harry Potter.author: Albus Dumbledore

The Matrix.quote: Unfortunately, no one can be told what the Matrix is. You have to see it for yourself.
The Matrix.author: Morpheus

The Matrix.quote: What is real? How do you define 'real'?
The Matrix.author: Morpheus

The Matrix.quote: Don't think you are, know you are.
The Matrix.author: Morpheus

The Matrix.quote: I'm trying to free your mind, Neo. But I can only show you the door. You're the one that has to walk through it.
The Matrix.author: Morpheus

The Matrix.quote: The Matrix is everywhere. It is all around us. Even now, in this very room.
The Matrix.author: Morpheus

The Matrix.quote: What you know you can't explain, but you feel it. You've felt it your entire life.
The Matrix.author: Morpheus

Fight Club.quote: The first rule of Fight Club is: You do not talk about Fight Club.
Fight Club.author: Tyler Durden

Fight Club.quote: It's only after we've lost everything that we're free to do anything.
Fight Club.author: Tyler Durden

Fight Club.quote: The things you own end up owning you.
Fight Club.author: Tyler Durden

Fight Club.quote: This is your life and it's ending one minute at a time.
Fight Club.author: Narrator

Fight Club.quote: You are not your job, you're not how much money you have in the bank. You are not the car you drive.
Fight Club.author: Tyler Durden
